seniority_level.evidence: 6-7 years total experience with 4-5 years relevant experience aligns with senior level in data engineering roles

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly mentions 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL, and data management systems

sub_specialty.evidence: Mandatory skills include ETL tools, Azure Databricks, and batch processing mentioned in responsibilities

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management or technical leadership responsibilities; focus is on individual contribution and collaboration

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, and Azure Blob explicitly mentioned as mandatory skills

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms mentioned in the job posting or extracted skills

processing_paradigm.evidence: Responsibilities mention both batch and real-time processing, indicating hybrid paradigm

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure DevOps mentioned as mandatory skill, which is a cloud-native orchestration tool

storage_layer.evidence: Azure Blob (data lake) and potential warehouse usage implied through data management responsibilities

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India, suggesting regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location in India (Bengaluru) indicates APAC timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Location specified but no mention of relocation requirement; likely expects local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship; location in India suggests local hiring only

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support; location in India suggests local hiring

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement mentioned; location in India implies local work authorization needed

w2_vs_1099.evidence: IBM is a large corporation; position described as Associate Software Developer suggests full-time W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job posting or extracted data
